Retirement village dispute: Race, gender prejudice cited, residents losthttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/gender-race-prejudice-against-female-village-owner-retirement-commission-publishes-ruling/XVUBCFHRDJBTRG2TWDJ6ZRF33Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/gender-race-prejudice-against-female-village-owner-retirement-commission-publishes-ruling/XVUBCFHRDJBTRG2TWDJ6ZRF33Q/ Anne GibsonFight over weekly fees charged by the operator had morphed into something else: decision Mon, 02 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 It was men in the village versus the female owner/operator: race and gender prejudice was cited.
